subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johnny Damon, who has played 1,705 games in the major leagues and has never been on the disabled list, had an M.R.I. Thursday that revealed a mild strain of the calf.
snippet: Johnny Damon, who has played 1,705 games in the major leagues and has never been on the disabled list, had an M.R.I. Thursday that revealed a mild strain of the calf.
